Spears::

She had her memory. Right up untill she got shot with the trainer 
chip. After that, it was all erased.

"Well, the last thing I remember, I was fighting some bots just 
outside the ark when Striker went down and..OH MY GOSH! STRIKER!" She 
tried to get up off the table and managed to fall on the floor.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Firearm::
> 
> Firearm shruggs. "I don't really know every detail, but I have some 
> info on it."
> 
> He looks at her, wondering if she still had Spears' memories. "You 
> wanna hear the whole story?"
> 
>
